room_title: Escape room "Sabotage - Black Ops" by Method of Escape in Fresno
review: This is a great idea if your looking to have a good time with a small group. Staff is friendly. We did the Sabotage- Black Ops.Don't go in thinking you will breeze through it. It will be a challenge you will enjoy and remember

room_title: Escape room "Sabotage - Black Ops" by Method of Escape in Fresno
review: I just got home from a night at Breakout and I can honestly say that I will be back! I went with a coworker and played Black Ops. Unfortunately we did not breakout but we still had a lot of fun! We were welcomed with smiles and great personalities and throughout the game enjoyed the interactions that we were given. It is a fun and mind churning experience that I can't wait to experience again!

room_title: Escape room "Sabotage - Black Ops" by Method of Escape in Fresno
review: Had a blast with my girls here last night. We totally didn't expect it to be as difficult as it was but we made it out in just under 3 minutes. That 60 minutes goes by WAY too fast...hahahaha

room_title: Escape room "Sabotage - Black Ops" by Method of Escape in Fresno
review: We failed to stop the nuclear launch. Can't wait to go back and try the other games. Much more entertaining than going to a movie.

room_title: Escape room "Sabotage - Black Ops" by Method of Escape in Fresno
review: Sorry Fresno -- we failed to stop the bomb :( I've had some experience with escape rooms, and Breakout definitely stands out as one of my favorites. The room I played (Sabotage) was the right mixture of entertaining, clever, and challenging. There was definitely a lot of scrambling around and yelling, but that's part of the experience.  If not impressed by the room, you'll love the staff. It's owned by a lovely couple, who are very welcoming and fun to talk to. Our gamekeeper, Brian, seemed really easy-going and did his best to help us out whenever we needed, both before the game and during. I'm definitely coming back -- I'll try not to leave Fresno in a nuclear waste next time.
